title: Cigarette blues
creator_credit: Dallas Museum of Art, Flower Films, Les Blank and Alan B. Govenar
brief_description: As Texas blues singer Sonny Rhodes performs a song about a lover who died from smoking cigarettes, the film shows a sculpture made entirely of butts from the cigarettes which eventually killed the sculptor, Louis Bunce.
creator_credit_for_label: Dallas Museum of Art, Flower Films, Les Blank and Alan B. Govenar
